Articles.Content:
Hi!

I didn\'t even know this program existed. My 6 year old daughter came running and and got me to come watch a show on ABC kids called 'Good Game' and someone wrote in and asked how to perform a \'mun\' landing. The show was pretty rubbish and didnt explain alot, but it did let me know about something called KSP!

For me, KSP feels a bit like Spore for adults, minus all the crap I think you guys are onto a winner here, and I can\'t wait to see what you add to it in the future. I am also pretty impressed with the quality and amount of mods that are available. I sill have some ways to go to perform a successful landing, but having a hell of alot of fun trying.

regards,

Devo.

Welcome to the KSP Forums!

Happy Launching!

Arrr!

Capt\'n Skunky

KSP Community Manager
